    • Method Detail

      • openSQLConnection

        public static void openSQLConnection()
        Called each time a GUI is opened to speed up the process. Sets the global conn1 variable

      • closeSQLConnection

        public static void closeSQLConnection()
        Called when the 'X' button of the GUI in the top right is clicked. Closes the SQL connection conn1

      • login

        public static common.User login(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Called when the user clicks the login button. Will check the database for the user logging in.
        Parameters:
        username - username of User
        password - password of User
        Returns:
        User object of person logging in

      • get_new_id

        public static int get_new_id(java.lang.String tableName)
        Create a random integer to be used as a user's userID between 1 and the max integer value. Checks the database to see if that Id is present, and then keeps trying until a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table that a new ID will be checked and created for
        Returns:
        int randomNum a new ID for some table record

      • add_user

        public static void add_user(int usertype,
                            java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String firstname,
                            java.lang.String lastname,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String phone,
                            java.lang.String passhash)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        adds a user to the database, first randomly generates a userID using the get_new_id() function
        Parameters:
        usertype - usertype of User
        username - username of User
        firstname - first name of User
        lastname - last name of User
        email - email address of User
        phone - phone number of User
        passhash - password of User
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • UnassignQuals

        public static void UnassignQuals(int lastClickeduserID,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<common.Qualification> assignedQuals,
                                 int[] selectedIndices)
        Removes a row from the qualification_assignments table to unassign a qualifications. Can remove more than one at a time by building a string of qualID's to match. example (1,2,5) or (1)
        Parameters:

        assignedQuals -
        selectedIndices -
